education.degree: MS in Computer Science, Machine Learning Track

education.school: University of Visvesvaraya College of Engineering
education.degree: BTech in Computer Science and Engineering

work_experiences.title: Project Intern
work_experiences.company: NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene
description: Developed an end-to-end pipeline to extract sensitive data from vaccination and medical reports, leveraging Qwen2-7B and combining unstructured text with structured metadata for richer context.
Improved accuracy of medical entity detection and reduced false positives, strengthening compliance with health data privacy regulations.

work_experiences.title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Built and deployed web crawlers using Selenium and Scrapy for the Dell Global Analytics team, enabling real-time competitor insights and improving data accuracy and coverage by 20%.
Automated Excel-based reporting workflows in a weekly data pipeline using Python (PyWin32, OpenPyXL), eliminating repetitive manual tasks and accelerating insight delivery by 40%.

work_experiences.title: Research Assistant
description: Conduct research on interpretable cervical cancer prediction using the Sipakmed dataset, applying transfer learning and LIME to support transparency and trust in AI-based medical diagnostics.
Optimize deep neural architectures (ResNet-50 V2, MobileNetV3, DenseNet-201, VGG-19) on cell image data, achieving 99.8% accuracy.

work_experiences.title: Summer Intern
description: Collaborate with stakeholders in the Dell Global Analytics team to gather business requirements and design a high-efficiency AI chatbot, reducing data retrieval time by 30%.
Develop the chatbot using the RASA framework and integrate DAX queries with Dellâ€™s Finance Data Mart, enabling real-time access to financial data and accelerating decision-making.

projects.name: Real Time Root Cause Analysis in GCP using AI Workflows
description: Built an automated, cloud-native RCA system using GCP (Pub/Sub, Logging, BigQuery) and Kubernetes to enable real-time error classification and remediation across six fault types.
Fine-tuned BERT classification model and deployed Dockerized, LLM-powered RCA services on Kubernetes for log analysis, integrating with Cloud Functions for event-driven inference.

projects.name: Neuralyst - LLM-Powered Task Management System
description: Implemented an LLM-powered web app using OpenAI Whisper, LLaMA, and Firebase featuring voice-to-text input, intelligent task parsing, and real-time data/task synchronization.
Designed a location and time-aware task prioritization engine using LLMs that dynamically reorders tasks based on user context to maximize user efficiency.

projects.name: RoboJackson: Rhythm-Aware Robotic Motion Generation
description: Built a pipeline to collect trending YouTube Shorts and extract 3D full-body motion using the SMPL model, then retargeted poses to a MuJoCo humanoid by resolving joint and DoF mismatches.
Developed a custom Gym environment with motion-based rewards and fine-tuned a TQC-pretrained humanoid to perform expressive, stable dance movements via reinforcement learning.

projects.name: DeepFake Detection from Facial Images
description: Developed a DeepFake detection pipeline by extracting frames from videos and classifying them using Vision Transformers (ViTs) and ResNets (accuracy: 91%) to achieve accurate facial image analysis.

projects.name: Personalized Music Recommendation System
description: Developed a content-based recommendation system that leverages cosine similarity to recommend the top 5 songs based on user preferences, returning results as a JSON object via API calls.

projects.name: Predictive Models for Disease Identification
description: Developed predictive models for disease identification using SVM, KNN, MLP, and Neural Networks, leveraging a dataset of 140 diseases and their symptoms to achieve a diagnostic accuracy of 94%.
